meanings.definition: Carbohydrates composed of three sugar units.
meanings.sent1: Trisaccharides are important for providing energy to our bodies.
meanings.sent2: I learned in biology class that trisaccharides are a type of carbohydrate.
meanings.sent3: The trisaccharides at the party were the life of the buffet table.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship was like trisaccharides, sweet and essential.
meanings.sent5: The trisaccharides danced in my mouth, leaving a sugary trail behind.

meanings.definition: Sugars made up of three monosaccharide molecules.
meanings.sent1: My favorite dessert contains trisaccharides that make it so sweet.
meanings.sent2: Trisaccharides are broken down into simpler sugars during digestion.
meanings.sent3: The trisaccharides in the recipe added a delightful sweetness to the dish.
meanings.sent4: His words were like trisaccharides, a blend of sweetness and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The trisaccharides in the candy created a burst of flavor in my mouth.
